type.title: Type
type.description: The name of the attribute this modifier is to act upon.

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: Slot or slot type the item must be in for the modifier to take effect.

uuid.title: UUID
uuid.description: The modifier's UUID, stored as four ints. Used when equipping and unequipping the item to identify which modifier to add or remove from the entity.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the modifier. Has no known effect.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount of change from the modifier.
